articles.title: The dirty soda experience has arrived in Mass.
articles.author: Brianna Borghi
articles.summary: The Fountain Confections has launched in Clinton, Massachusetts, offering 'dirty soda,' a customizable beverage of soda with syrups and creamer. Other companies such as Sonic Drive-In, Far Out Ice Cream in Brookline, and select Crumbl Cookies locations also offer the beverage.

articles.title: The Ultimate Diet to Reverse Heart Disease: A Cardiologist's Guide
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: A technology company launched a new AI feature designed to enhance user experience. The AI analyzes user behavior and contextual data in real-time to dynamically adjust content delivery and personalize the interface, making interactions more intuitive and efficient.

articles.title: imagine celebrates regional recognition at BrandLaureate Awards in Singapore
articles.summary: imagine Sdn Bhd, having received the BrandLaureate BestBrands Award 2025, is preparing to launch new bundle packages and enhanced digital services. This follows a major digital systems upgrade designed to improve service delivery, product innovation, and operational efficiency.

articles.title: 48 Products I Wholeheartedly Think You Would Use All The Time
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for a radiant complexion. OPI launched RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish for smudge-free nails in 60 seconds. Medix released a retinol body lotion with ferulic acid for tighter skin. Good Molecules launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to minimize eye puffiness. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener to brighten dark circles.

articles.title: Suzuki Australia 'ready' for new emissions regulations
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: Suzuki is preparing for Australia's New Vehicle Efficiency Standard (NVES) by introducing additional mild-hybrid vehicles. The company is also readying its first electric vehicle (EV) for the Australian market.

articles.title: The Buzz Marketing Presents HandyXDetail: Precision Vacuum Glove
articles.summary: The Buzz Marketing announces the licensing availability of HandyXDetail, a glove-based vacuum solution. It integrates a battery-powered vacuum into a wearable glove with fingertip suction, designed for precision cleaning in automotive, tech, and industrial markets. The Buzz Marketing seeks manufacturing partners to bring HandyXDetail to market.

articles.title: Tom Holland returns as Spider-Man in ‘Brand New Day', first look at new suit
articles.summary: Sony Pictures revealed a first glimpse of Spider-Man's brand-new suit for the upcoming movie 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day'. The reveal was shared on social media on Spider-Man Day. The movie is set to release in theatres on July 31, 2026.

articles.title: The Galaxy Z Fold 7 brings foldables to the brink of greatness
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 is introduced as their best foldable phone yet, featuring a thinner, lighter design and improved performance. It includes a larger inner and outer display, powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and has an upgraded 200-megapixel main camera. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is now available starting at $2,000 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad Lite goes on sale: Budget tablet with 9340 mAh battery. Check price, availability, features
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus Pad Lite, a budget-friendly tablet, on August 1, 2025. The tablet features an 11-inch display, quad speakers, a 9340 mAh battery, and comes in two variants: 6GB RAM + 128GB storage (Wi-Fi) at INR 12,999 and 8GB RAM + 128GB storage (Wi-Fi + 4G LTE) at INR 14,999. It will be available on OnePlus.in, Amazon, Flipkart, OnePlus Experience Stores, and major offline retailers.

articles.title: Hey Microsoft, is it 'Xbox PC' or 'Xbox on PC'?
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft initially introduced the "Xbox PC" branding to market its games available on PC through the Xbox PC app and store. However, Microsoft quickly transitioned to using "Xbox on PC" branding, even using both terms simultaneously in a blog post announcing Hellblade II Enhanced. Third-party publishers also adopted the "Xbox PC" branding.

articles.title: 17 July Beauty Launches That Are Too Good To Miss
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Dae launched a refreshing citrus-scented fragrance mist for hair and skin. Hello Sunday introduced an SPF lip tint that provides sun protection without a chemical taste. Bioré launched the Bubbling Nose Mask, containing exfoliants to keep the nose clean and clear.

articles.title: We review 100s of products a year — here are 12 we would actually recommend from July
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: Yahoo Canada team tried and recommends the best products in July 2025, including a self-cleaning litter box, a tote bag, and peel-and-stick wallpaper. These products were tested by the editors.

articles.title: 2025 'Product of the Year' winners revealed
articles.author: Caitlin Rogers
articles.summary: The 2025 'Product of the Year' winners have been revealed, showcasing innovative products such as Tamko Stormfighter Flex shingles, Brawny 3-Ply Paper Towels, Bulleit American's Single Malt Whiskey, Aldi Exclusive Specialty Selected snowcrab legs, and PBZ OTC itch relief cream.

articles.title: New Novel, ‘From the Dictators' Shadows: A Family's Journey,' Offers an Immigrant's Story of Civil War, Resistance and Reinvention
articles.author: EZ Newswire
articles.summary: Pegasus Publishers launched a debut novel by Maritza Durán. This occurred in New York, NY.

articles.title: TheSuperMade Launches Loyalty Rewards Program for Returning Customers
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A streetwear brand launched a new loyalty rewards program on August 1, 2025. The program aims to reward returning customers and make it easier for them to stay connected to new collections and collaborations. This is designed to enhance customer experience and foster community engagement.

articles.title: Get Your Data Ready for AI with NexusTek
articles.author: Nexus Tek
articles.summary: NexusTek launched Data Modernization services on August 1, 2025. These services aim to establish a unified data source for AI and advanced analytics. The launch was announced in Denver.

articles.title: Z Supply Review 2025: What to Buy From the Comfy Clothing Brand
articles.author: Hannah Oh
articles.summary: Z Supply introduces a soft casual clothing line featuring breezy vibes, linen tanks, embroidery, and elevated basics with a West Coast spin. A reviewer tested items including a cotton set, striped shorts, nautical tee, black tank, and workout dress, praising their softness and fit.

articles.title: Gap's '90s Perfumes Are Available for Purchase in 2025—If You Know Where to Look
articles.author: Marianne Mychaskiw
articles.summary: Gap has relaunched its popular 90s perfumes, including Dream, Heaven, Om, Grass, Day, and Earth. Originally launched in the mid-90s, these fragrances catered to the minimalist and accessible beauty trends of the time, with marketing focused on the youth demographic.

articles.title: Samsung's JB Park reveals why the company has not yet launched Trifold smartphone
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Samsung confirmed plans to launch a trifold smartphone but delayed its release to assess consumer value. The company has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 smartphones and will incorporate AI features, including real-time translation.

articles.title: 7 Ways to Get the Most Out of Your Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Bertel King
articles.summary: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Samsung's thinnest and lightest Fold yet, features a brighter 8-inch display and on-device Galaxy AI. It offers a taskbar resembling a Windows layout and allows users to configure it to their preferences. Users can also choose to mirror their internal and cover screens or have them function as separate spaces.

articles.title: We just got our first proper look at GPD's battery-optional Strix Halo handheld gaming PC and I'm still unconvinced
articles.author: James Bentley
articles.summary: GPD is showcasing its new gaming handheld, the GPD Win 5, powered by an AMD Strix Halo processor, which requires an external battery. Ayaneo is also developing a similar device with its own internal battery. Release date and pricing for the GPD Win 5 are not yet available.

articles.title: Sneak peak at Spider-Man's Brand New Day suit
articles.summary: Sony Pictures has revealed a sneak peek of Spider-Man's brand-new suit for the upcoming film, 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day.' The new suit, worn by Tom Holland, retains the classic red color but features raised webbing, marking a significant change in the character's on-screen appearance.

articles.title: Zeekr Group Announces July 2025 Delivery Update  Aug. 1, 2025 15:30
articles.summary: Zeekr Group introduced its Super Hybrid Technologies, built on the SEA-S platform, featuring a 900V high-voltage architecture and CATL Freevoy Super Hybrid Battery. The Zeekr 9X will be the first model to incorporate this technology, delivering 0-100 km/h acceleration in under 3.1 seconds and ultra-fast charging capabilities, achieving a 20% to 80% charge in approximately 9 minutes.

articles.title: This Outlandish Shark Tank Invention Lets You Wake Up To The Smell Of Bacon
articles.author: Kristine Belonio
articles.summary: Matty Sallin introduced "Wake n' Bacon," a bacon alarm clock-oven hybrid, on "Shark Tank", designed to heat and cook bacon before the alarm rings, filling the room with its aroma. He sought $40,000 for a 20% stake to improve the prototype, but the sharks ultimately declined due to safety and hygiene concerns.

articles.title: Wild Video Shows Humanoid Robot Loading a Washing Machine Pretty Well
articles.summary: Figure is showcasing its F.02 humanoid robot using its 'Helix' neural network, demonstrating the robot's ability to load laundry into a washing machine. This follows prior demonstrations of the robot sorting packages and assisting at a BMW factory.

articles.title: The best Amazon deals this weekend will save you up to 75% on bedding, tech and more
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on various products, including KitchenAid oven mitts and L'Oreal serum. Customers can also get free shipping with Amazon Prime or on orders of $35 or more.

articles.title: Gossipy J2O advert gives pubgoers the juice
articles.author: Mark Dishman
articles.summary: J2O launched a new ad campaign centered on the theme of 'gossip,' portraying their beverage as the drink of choice for non-alcoholic pub-goers. The advertisement presents a quick recap of an event's highlights, aiming to entertain viewers and promote the brand's positioning.

articles.title: National Girlfriend Day 2025: Unmissable deals and discounts on clothing, accessories, and bouquets
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Nordstrom is offering discounts of up to 50% off on fashion, beauty, and accessories during its Anniversary Sale. J.Crew and Gap are providing up to 50% off on summer styles such as dresses and tops. Local florists are offering same-day flower and gift box delivery services with personalized options.

articles.title: Fashion, function and folax: Infinix is serving looks and brains
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: In 2025, Infinix Nigeria launched three new smartphones: the NOTE 50 Pro featuring an AI assistant with Davido's voice, the HOT 60 Pro+ with a slim design and advanced camera features for content creators, and the budget-friendly SMART 10 Plus with Android 14 Go Edition. These new phones cater to diverse needs and are designed to be smart and stylish.

articles.title: TFT டிஸ்பிளே மற்றும் புதிய நிறங்களுடன் MT-15 வெர்ஷன் 2.0 பைக்கை அப்டேட் செய்துள்ளது யமஹா!
articles.summary: Yamaha updated its Mt 15 Version 2 motorcycle. The updated version features a new TFT display and is available in unique new colors.

articles.title: 34 TikTok Products You Shouldn't Miss Out On
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new beauty and health products have been introduced, including Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, Olay Super Serum Body Wash, Lumify Eye Drops, Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, Mise En Scene Perfect Serum, Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm, Dae's Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand, Catrice \"Instant Awake\" Under Eye Brightener and Plus Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. New products such as Oxo's compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer and Ninja's portable Crispi Air Fryer have also been launched to simplify daily life. New handy and multi-use products like Touchland Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer, Londontown \"Nail Veil\" Protectant and dual-sided SneakErasers have also been introduced to market.

articles.title: All The New Switch Games And Demos Released Today After The July 2025 Nintendo Direct
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo's July Partner Showcase unveiled several new games and ports coming to the new Nintendo Switch 2. These games feature systems designed for exploration and gameplay.

articles.title: From lead to loyalty: AI agents that nurture customer relationships at scale
articles.summary: Blaze introduces AI agents that transform customer relationship management by providing intelligent, personalized engagement at every stage of the customer lifecycle. These agents analyze customer behavior in real-time, understand context, predict actions, and proactively address needs, representing a quantum leap beyond basic marketing automation.

articles.title: Reddit plans to unify its search interface as it looks to become a search engine
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: Reddit plans to unify its core search function with Reddit Answers, an AI-powered Q&A product, aiming for a single search experience within its app. Furthermore, the company has launched two new ad tools that allow marketers to utilize Reddit data and comments in their advertising campaigns.

articles.title: 33 Products With Results That Are Shockingly Good
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris introduces an anti-redness BB cream to neutralize redness and hydrate skin. Catrice launches "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener to conceal dark circles. Essence releases Lash Princess lengthening mascara, promising long-lasting, smudge-free wear, while E.l.f Cosmetics offers Lash Xtndr tubing mascara for lengthening and defining lashes with easy water removal. Nivea unveils a lightweight gel cream featuring Q10 for plumper, firmer skin.

articles.title: Leaked images reveal Google's new budget earbuds
articles.summary: A leaked render reveals the Google Pixel Buds 2a, a potential successor to the Google Pixel Buds a. The new earbuds feature a 'Iris' pale Lilac hue visible in the case's innards with a white outer casing. The launch is anticipated at an upcoming Google event in a few weeks.

articles.title: AUSTIN BUTLER FRONTS NEW YSL BEAUTY MYSLF ABSOLU CAMPAIGN
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) Beauty has launched MYSLF ABSOLU, a new fragrance described as an intense and radiant version of its masculine icon, MYSLF. The fragrance features notes of ginger, orange blossom, and patchouli and is packaged in a redesigned bottle with a metallic finish. Austin Butler is the ambassador for the MYSLF ABSOLU campaign.

articles.title: Demi Lovato Drops New Single ‘Fast,' First From Upcoming Album
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Demi Lovato released a new single. This represents the launch of a new musical product by the artist.

articles.title: 47 Products To Try This Summer That Seem Too Good To Be True But Actually Work
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Several new products have been introduced to enhance summer experiences. These include One/Size's On 'Til Dawn waterproof setting spray for makeup, the Owala Freesip insulated bottle with a built-in straw and wide-mouth spout, and the Cosrx SPF 50+ sunscreen with a moisturizer-like texture. Additionally, Miracle-Gro water-storing crystals have been launched to aid plant survival, and Elizabeth Mott's Thank Me Later eyeshadow primer ensures long-lasting eye makeup.

articles.title: The trouble with Agent, ChatGPT's new web-browsing AI
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a new ChatGPT agent called 'Agent' that can perform multistep processes with autonomy. The agent opens a web browser on a remote OpenAI computer and displays accessed web pages while explaining each step. However, initial user experiences reveal limitations, as the agent can be slower than existing tools and struggles with website interactions and accurate information retrieval.

articles.title: Uber's Drive to Become the Kleenex of Robotaxis
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Uber's mission now focuses on ensuring users book robocars through its app, regardless of the technology provider.

articles.title: Comic Book Store Simulator Demo Now Live on Steam: Run Your Dream Geek Haven Today
articles.author: Percy Tolentino
articles.summary: Akhir Pekan Studio has launched a free demo of their new game, Comic Book Store Simulator, on Steam. The game is a single-player management sim where players manage a comic book store, including organizing inventory, negotiating with customers, and hosting events. The demo includes the prologue, tutorial, and a side quest, showcasing early game features and offering a glimpse into the full release.

articles.title: This Light-Blocking Tent Let My Toddler Sleep 12+ Hours for the First Time Ever
articles.author: Hannah Jones
articles.summary: The SlumberPod is a portable privacy pod designed to create a blackout sleep environment for children, and the company has expanded its offerings to include the Slumbertot, an inflatable mattress, and the SlumberCalm portable sound machine. The SlumberPod is travel-friendly and creates ease for parents who want their children to sleep in new spaces, even with light present.

articles.title: [Hansung University Campus Town Startups 2025] 'Digital E&S', a startup that develops an AI-based lightweight DevOps integration platform
articles.author: 매거진한경
articles.summary: Digital E&S's CEO, Yang OkSu, introduced a new open-source, lightweight DevOps platform designed for hybrid management. The platform includes AI-based quality automated testing, risk prediction, project-specific dashboard visualization, and data-based alerts.

articles.title: Warning over drivers running red lights at £145 million lifting bridge
articles.author: Sam Russell
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled its new Adidas home and away kits. New shirt numbers have also been announced, including the shirt number for Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: Prajwal Revanna breaks down in court after conviction in rape case
articles.summary: The Vivo X Fold 5 is being examined for its design, display, performance, cameras, battery, and durability. The review aims to determine if the device justifies its premium price and if it sets a new benchmark in the foldable smartphone market.

articles.title: Omari Hutchinson: Brentford form transfer plan to sign key target from Ipswich
articles.author: Sam Tabuteau
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled its new Adidas home and away kits. The company also announced new shirt numbers.

articles.title: Two admit rioting following the deaths of boys in e-bike crash
articles.author: George Thompson
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled its new Adidas home and away kits. The announcement also included confirmation of new shirt numbers for players.

articles.title: Olivia Attwood to front new reality TV cooking show
articles.author: Jenny Garnsworthy
articles.summary: Liverpool unveiled new Adidas home and away kits. The unveiling also confirmed new shirt numbers.

articles.title: CISF in Rajya Sabha? Opposition alleges ploy to muzzle protesting MPs
articles.summary: Vivo is being assessed for the Vivo X Fold 5 foldable smartphone, covering its design, display, performance, cameras, battery, and durability. The evaluation aims to determine if it justifies its premium price and establishes a new benchmark in the foldable smartphone market.

articles.title: New GSA app aims to curb fake electrical cables and protect consumers ‎- Mogtari
articles.summary: The Ghana Standards Authority (GSA) has launched a new mobile app as part of the Ghana Digital Conformity Pilot Project in Accra. This app aims to help consumers verify the quality of electrical cables produced by local companies, addressing concerns about counterfeit products and ensuring compliance with quality standards.

articles.title: New GSA app aims to curb fake electrical cables and protect consumers ‎
articles.summary: The Ghana Standards Authority (GSA) has launched a new mobile app to help consumers verify the quality of electrical cables produced by local companies. This initiative, part of the Ghana Digital Conformity Pilot Project, aims to combat counterfeit products and ensure compliance with quality standards, starting with electrical cables.

articles.title: Storm Floris to batter UK with 85mph winds as Met Office issues yellow warning
articles.author: Sami Quadri
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled their new Adidas home and away kits. The announcement also confirmed the new shirt numbers for players like Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: Global stock markets under pressure after Trump's latest tariff blow
articles.author: Holly Williams
articles.summary: Liverpool has introduced new home and away kits designed by Adidas. The unveiling includes the announcement of new shirt numbers for players, including Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: Marc Guiu: Young Chelsea FC star set for loan switch to Premier League rivals
articles.author: Dom Smith
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled new home and away kits designed by Adidas. The launch also includes the announcement of new shirt numbers for players, including Florian Wirtz, impacting merchandise offerings.

articles.title: Glasgow transforms into New York as Spider-Man filming begins
articles.author: Ryan Mcdougall
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled new Adidas home and away kits. The announcement includes confirmation of new shirt numbers.

articles.title: Storm Floris to batter parts of UK on Monday in latest named storm
articles.author: Pol Allingham
articles.summary: Liverpool unveiled their new Adidas home and away kits. New shirt numbers for players were also announced.

articles.title: KredosAi: Seed Funding Closed For Scaling AI-Based Messaging Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: KredosAi has announced seed funding to expand its AI-native customer engagement platform, following its RCS deployment with UScellular. The platform combines conversational intelligence, RCS messaging, and real-time data to engage past-due customers, easing payments and strengthening relationships. KredosAi plans to use the funding to expand into new markets, enhance AI capabilities, and grow sales and marketing.

articles.title: How I Choose a Good Sweat-Resistant Sunscreen for My Workouts
articles.author: Beth Skwarecki
articles.summary: The article highlights Blue Lizard's mineral sunscreen stick as a preferred face sunscreen, mentioning its pocket-sized convenience. Trader Joe's silicone-based sunscreen is also mentioned as a popular choice, and Neutrogena's Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch sunscreen is favored for its texture.

articles.title: Here's our first look at the Pixel Buds 2a — currently expected to launch next month
articles.author: Tom Pritchard
articles.summary: Google is expected to launch the Pixel Buds 2a, a follow-up to the A-series buds, potentially during the Made by Google event on August 20. Leaks suggest the Pixel Buds 2a will be available in colors like "Iris," "Strawberry," and "Fog Light", and improvements in sound quality and battery life are anticipated, with noise canceling being a possible addition. The Pixel Buds 2a is expected to debut alongside the Pixel 10 series and the Pixel Watch 4.

articles.title: 'It's absolutely awful': Jeremy Clarkson closes farm due to TB outbreak amid 'worst year ever'
articles.author: Ekin Karasin
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled new home and away kits manufactured by Adidas. The announcement also included the confirmation of new shirt numbers for players like Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: England's Chris Woakes set to miss rest of Oval test with left shoulder injury
articles.author: Rory Dollard
articles.summary: Liverpool, in association with Adidas, has unveiled new home and away kits. The announcement included the confirmation of new shirt numbers for players.

articles.title: Recently, Shanxi Jianlong delivered its first batch of textured color-coated steel products to a customer for use in a steel structure project. The excellent surface texture and product quality, along with superior processability, have been highly praised by the customer.
articles.author: China Steel Market
articles.summary: Shanxi Jianlong delivered its first batch of textured color-coated steel products. This marks the introduction of a new product line by the company.

articles.title: Domain Name and Web Hosting Order System in PHP - only $25 /one time fee
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart offers a PHP-based domain name and web hosting order system. The service features AJAX-powered domain availability checks, WHOIS lookups, and a streamlined one-page order process. It supports 700+ domain extensions and Paypal payments.

articles.title: Harry Redknapp's £5m Sandbanks mansion targeted by hammer-wielding burglars
articles.author: Niva Yadav
articles.summary: Liverpool unveiled new Adidas home and away kits. The club also announced new shirt numbers for players including Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: Watch: Injured Ukrainian soldier stranded for days flees battlefield on e-bike delivered by drone
articles.author: Bill Bowkett
articles.summary: Liverpool has unveiled new home and away kits manufactured by Adidas. The club also confirmed new shirt numbers for players like Florian Wirtz.

articles.title: At 30% off, the Galaxy Tab S6 Lite is budget champ you don't want to miss
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Tab S6 Lite is currently available with a 30% discount. The budget-friendly tablet features an S Pen, Exynos 1280 chip, Samsung DeX support, Dolby Atmos-tuned speakers, and a 7,040mAh battery providing up to 14 hours of battery life.

articles.title: Langflow: Running AI Agents Locally on RTX Graphics Cards
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Langflow now supports offline AI agent development on NVIDIA GeForce RTX GPUs by integrating with NVIDIA NeMo microservices, Ollama, and the NVIDIA Triton Inference Server. This enables developers to create and deploy AI agents that run entirely offline, directly on user devices, enhancing privacy and reducing latency.

articles.title: Nissan Magnite earns coveted five-star safety rating from Global NCAP
articles.author: Willem van de Putte
articles.summary: Nissan Magnite has achieved a five-star overall safety rating from GNCAP, a significant improvement from its previous two-star rating. This compact SUV now features over 40 standard safety features and has improved its safety performance in a short timeframe, demonstrating Nissan's commitment to customer safety.

articles.title: Leading Beauty and Skincare Brands in Nigeria
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: Beautiful Body Nigeria offers a wide range of skincare products designed to keep skin healthy and enhance its natural beauty and plans to expand to the UAE and Europe. Hush'D Makeovers Limited offers over 60 skincare products tailored for men, women, and children using natural ingredients. Glee Luxury Hair & Skincare offers premium bundles, wigs, closures, basic facials, acne and anti-aging treatments, body scrubs, massages, waxing, and specialty treatments like microblading.

articles.title: Moloco SDK Is Now Available via Google AdMob and Ad Manager
articles.author: Moloco
articles.summary: Fyber's SDK is now available through Google AdMob and Ad Manager, enabling app developers to monetize their inventory via Fyber's advertiser ecosystem while maintaining user experience quality. The SDK is optimized for ad monetization and driving business outcomes, and it is already a certified bidding partner for AppLovin's MAX and Unity's LevelPlay.

articles.title: OXIO Welcomes Steve Parrott as SVP of Product Management
articles.author: Treble
articles.summary: OXIO is driving the continued evolution of its Telecom-as-a-Service platform and industry-leading telecom APIs. The company plans to advance the offering in programmable telecom infrastructure, real-time data orchestration and enterprise-grade tools to help clients launch, manage, and scale branded mobile experiences.

articles.title: Catherine Thorbecke: Will AI help or wreck your summer vacation?
articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.summary: ChatGPT, DeepSeek, and Manus are used to create travel itineraries. These AI platforms offer convenience in travel planning but may provide outdated or generic recommendations, potentially homogenizing travel experiences.

articles.title: 34 Essential Products You've Been Putting Off Buying
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: Consumers are sharing their positive experiences with newly purchased products. A stain remover effectively removed red ice pop stains from a white tank top. A mosquito repellent bracelet proved effective in preventing mosquito bites. Additionally, a foot softening spray quickly softens dry skin. Lastly, a folding banana hook hanger has been a great addition to the kitchen.

articles.title: Terry's Chocolate Orange launches new flavour and shoppers will only find it in one UK supermarket
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: Terry's Chocolate has launched a new flavor, Terry's Chocolate Caramel, exclusively at Co-op. Cadbury has also introduced a new Bournville bar with hazelnut and salted caramel, a Dairy Milk Iced Latte flavor, and a White Dipped Twirl. Mars has reintroduced White Chocolate Maltesers after 11 years.

articles.title: Terry's Chocolate Orange launches new flavour and shoppers will only find it in one UK supermarket
articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.summary: Terry's Chocolate has launched a new flavor, Terry's Chocolate Caramel, exclusively available at Co-op supermarkets. Cadbury also introduced a new Bournville bar with chopped hazelnut and salted caramel, a Dairy Milk Iced Latte flavor, and a White Dipped Twirl. Mars has relaunched White Chocolate Maltesers after 11 years.

articles.title: Are AI Agents The Future Of Customer Service?
articles.author: Kolawole Samuel Adebayo
articles.summary: Pine AI and other companies like Adept AI and Cognosys AI are introducing AI agents designed to automate customer service, capable of resolving complex requests and reducing operational costs.  These AI agents offer proactive support, interacting directly with interfaces and adapting to complex situations, potentially transforming business-customer interactions.

articles.title: AI or human? How to tell if song is really AI-generated
articles.author: Associated Press
articles.summary: Deezer has introduced a feature to flag AI-generated songs within its app and website, labeling them as "AI-generated content." This feature aims to enhance transparency and combat streaming fraud, utilizing in-house technology to detect patterns in AI-generated audio. Up to 18% of songs uploaded daily are identified as AI-generated.

articles.title: Meghan Markle's 'authenticity' questioned after new As Ever announcement?
articles.author: Hafsa Noor
articles.summary: As Ever announced that its 2024 Napa Valley Rosé will be available for purchase next week. The company expressed gratitude to customers for their support and encouraged them to find beauty in everyday experiences.

articles.title: Dyson cuts £150 off 'superior' V8 Absolute vacuum
articles.summary: Dyson's V8 Absolute vacuum, known for its strong suction and cordless design, is currently available at a reduced price. Shark offers an alternative bundle featuring the Stratos anti-hair wrap plus pet pro cordless vacuum and Klik n' Flip automatic steam mop. Amazon Basics has the two-in-one cordless vacuum available.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Brentwood woman arrested for attacking boy in Novato
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is investing in America's best mobile network. Adidas is facing financial impact due to U.S. tariffs, potentially increasing U.S. prices by 200 million euros.

articles.title: NEW – F.02 humanoid robot is doing laundry, not teleoperated, but by using an AI neural network.
articles.author: SGT
articles.summary: The F.02 humanoid robot uses an AI neural network to perform laundry tasks. This functionality is autonomous, not teleoperated.

articles.title: Local sambal makes inroads into overseas markets, says Rubiah
articles.author: Bp Editor
articles.summary: Rubiah launched Sambal Street 2025 in Kuala Lumpur to promote local sambal products by Felcra-supported entrepreneurs. The event features over 30 sambal products from 16 entrepreneurs, which are being marketed through various channels, including petrol stations, digital platforms, and export channels to Asean and Middle Eastern countries.

articles.title: Royal fans make same complaint after Meghan Markle's huge announcement
articles.author: Sophia Papamavroudi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, is launching a new 2024 Napa Valley Rosé wine next week, following the success of their debut rosé. The new wine will be available for purchase and is described as a blend with a harmony of flavors, intended for summer enjoyment. As Ever teased the launch on social media, generating both excitement and criticism regarding the use of the term "vintage."

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: 'Smokey The Bear' Helps Arrest Man Who Stole Signs From FL Parks: Official
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network. Ookla Speedtest reports that T-Mobile is America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 4 Edge AI Laptop With Snapdragon X CPU Launched In India: Price, Features
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Book 4 Edge laptop in India, a Windows AI laptop powered by the Snapdragon X processor. Priced at Rs 64,990 as an introductory offer, the laptop features Galaxy AI capabilities and includes a physical Copilot key, along with other hardware specifications like a 2MP webcam, Dolby Atmos speakers, and various connectivity ports.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 review: Solves ‘crease' issue
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Flip7 and the budget-friendly Samsung Z Flip7 FE, featuring a larger FlexWindow, slimmer design, improved cover screen, and enhanced battery life. The Galaxy Z Flip7 addresses the 'crease problem' and offers a more seamless display. Both models are available through Samsung's online store and retailers like The Good Guys, with prices ranging from $1499 to $1999 depending on storage and model.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon 5G Sale Now Live in India; Check Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon 5G smartphone in India with a special launch price of INR 8,999, including bank offers. The phone features a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, 128GB storage, Android 15 OS, a 6.74-inch 120Hz display, a 50MP camera, and an 18W fast-charging 5,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Best new hair tool: As Dyson unveils Airwrap Co-anda 2x for $999, here's everything you need to know
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Airwrap Co-anda 2x, a new version of its popular Airwrap hair styling tool. The new device features a Hyperdymium motor, six attachments including the Airsmooth, and RFI chips for auto-adjusting settings, promising quicker drying and styling. It also has MyDyson app integration for personalized styling sequences.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) Review: Decoding What Carl Pei and His Team Are Aiming For
articles.author: Expertise. With A Talent
articles.summary: Nothing has launched its new phone, the Nothing Phone (3), featuring a unique design, improved performance with the Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset, a Glyph Matrix, and an intentional operating system. The phone aims to offer a distinct user experience, differentiating itself from the competition, and is priced at INR 80,000 (90K for the 512GB variant).

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke AI Jet Ultra review: is this premium vacuum worth the sky-high price?
articles.author: Lizzie Wilmot
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke Jet AI Ultra, a new AI-powered cordless vacuum cleaner featuring 400W of power and AI Cleaning Mode 2.0 that automatically detects floor types and adjusts suction. It comes with a Clean Station, two batteries providing up to 100 minutes of runtime, and is available in Satin Black and Mint colors for £1,199/$1,099 from Samsung's website and major retailers.

articles.title: 'I switched my perfume to a cheaper alternative - and I've never had so many compliments'
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: OUAI launched Hair and Body Mist - St Barts, priced at £26, offering a sweet, fresh scent. Guerlain introduced Absolus Allegorua Santal Royal Hair Mist, a hair perfume originating from the Eau de Parfum, costing £61, with a luxurious scent. STRAAND released Heaven Scent Hair Perfume & Gloss for £24, combining fragrance with a gloss and anti-pollution shield.

articles.title: "After K-food K-beauty, it's K-washing now. The goal is to open the first overseas store of the Krem..
articles.author: Shin Soo County
articles.summary: Cleantopia, a Korean laundry franchise company, plans to launch its laundry system overseas, targeting Asia and the Middle East initially. Cleantopia provides different store types (Cleantopia, Cleantopia Multi, Coin wash 365) and new service such as collection delivery service , Black Label service and moving in services. The company aims to solidify its leading position by exporting its laundry system and expanding its B2B business.

articles.title: Elon Musk confirms Imagine and Valentine access will roll out to these Grok users soon
articles.summary: xAI's Grok is set to launch 'Imagine,' an AI-powered digital media creation tool, and 'Valentine,' an interactive AI persona. 'Imagine' allows users to generate images and videos from text prompts, while 'Valentine' offers a moody, conversational AI companion. Beta access will be rolled out to Grok Heavy subscribers, with 'Imagine' updates expected in October for Super Grok subscribers before broader availability.

articles.title: 佳隆股份：公司目前拥有发明专利9项，实用新型专利23项，外观设计专利20项_手机网易网

articles.title: Best Men's Trimmers for Effortless Grooming at Home
articles.summary: A new grooming solution is being introduced, emphasizing precision, style, and affordability. This service aims to provide users with intelligent trimming capabilities for a smooth and powerful grooming experience.

articles.title: Mobile Car Wash Service Market Valued at USD 5.80 Billion in 2022, Projected to Grow at 10.5% CAGR Through 2030  Aug. 1, 2025 05:17
articles.summary: Get Spiffy, Inc. closed its Series C funding round, raising approximately USD 30 million. The funding supports the development and expansion of the company's private-label software and hardware offerings for automotive dealers. This investment strengthens Get Spiffy's position in the Mobile Car Wash Service market.

articles.title: 12 Best Dry Shampoos for Every Hair Type in 2025
articles.author: Feneley
articles.summary: TYPEBEA launched G5 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo which instantly soaks up oil and sweat. Klorane launched Dry Shampoo With Oat and Ceramide which absorbs oil, extends blow-dry, and keeps hair soft. Olaplex launched No. 4D Clean Volume Detox Dry Shampoo absorbs oil while giving hair that super clean feeling.

articles.title: Royal Family LIVE: Meghan Markle sent 'authenticity' warning

articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched her Netflix show, "With Love, Meghan," and her brand, "As Ever." These launches are receiving mixed reviews.

articles.title: Top 10 Benefits Of Same Day Delivery Services
articles.summary: Norwest Logistic Management offers integrated delivery solutions to empower businesses, focusing on same-day delivery to meet evolving consumer expectations. Implementing same-day delivery leads to advantages like improved customer satisfaction and increased sales. Embracing fast delivery enhances operational efficiency and fosters stronger brand loyalty.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge test: nobody asked for thinner phone but is it unwelcome
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-thin 5.8mm smartphone featuring a 6.7in 120Hz LTPO OLED display and powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite. Available for €1269, the device includes a dual rear camera system with a 200MP primary lens and promises seven years of OS and security updates.

articles.title: 37 Personal Care Products For 'Asking For A Friend' Problems
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The content introduces several new personal care and hygiene products, including a Squatty Potty, callus-removing gel, anti-dandruff shampoo, fungal nail renewal formula, after-sex sponge, denture cleaner tablet, Nivea gel cream, blackhead spatula, Dermora's foot exfoliation mask, Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap, sulfate-free biotin shampoo, ear washer bottle, earwax removal kit, wart remover pads, corn remover pads, Gold Bond anti-friction stick, SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes, aluminum-free deodorant wipes, stainless-steel tongue scraper, silicone kegel weights, anti-bacterial butt acne-clearing lotion, Tend Skin Solution, Bio-Oil, antiperspirant hand cream, exfoliating scrub mitt, vegan exfoliating body scrub, nose wax kit, stainless-steel toenail clipper, tonsil stone remover, incontinence pads, Wonder Balm, seamless bra liners, Veet's sensitive hair removal gel, teeth-whitening pen, and alcohol-free oral rinse.

articles.title: Nickelodeon releases new series this month
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Nickelodeon is releasing a new series this August holiday edition. The release includes premieres and specials.

articles.title: NP Digital Australia reports strongest half-year growth in 2025
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: NP Digital Australia experienced growth in the first half of 2025, onboarding clients like Gallagher Security, Family Doctor, and Zero Latency, focusing on integrated digital solutions such as SEO, paid media, and content strategy. To meet the growing demand and to help brands navigate the evolving landscape of AI-driven marketing the company is actively hiring across SEO, marketing automation, and creative strategy and also investing in advanced analytics, AI-reporting, and conversion rate optimisation to expand its performance ecosystem.

articles.title: What I Want to See From the Steam Deck 2
articles.author: Jacqueline Thomas
articles.summary: The article anticipates the launch of a new Steam Deck by Valve, emphasizing the importance of maintaining a low price point. It suggests that despite the emergence of more expensive competitors like the MSI Claw 8 AI+, Valve can subsidize the hardware cost to drive users to the Steam store.

articles.title: Revscale AI Unveils Peripheral, a Unified Intelligence Platform to Power Smarter Business Growth
articles.author: Revscale AI
articles.summary: An unnamed company has launched Peripheral, a unified intelligence layer and agentic AI solution. Peripheral centralizes insights from digital touchpoints into a real-time system that learns, adapts, and drives conversion, functioning as the operating brain behind a business's growth engine.

articles.title: Pureprofile launches AI-Powered message testing platform
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Pureprofile Limited has launched Message Testing, a new solution designed for marketers and researchers to quickly test and refine messaging using synthetic respondents. These AI profiles, powered by PersonaPanels' synthetic data engine, replicate audience behaviors and preferences. The platform offers instant feedback and supports targeted testing, providing a secure and scalable alternative to traditional research methods.

articles.summary: Genius Gourmet launched its Sparkling Protein Clear Protein beverage, a clear and crisp sparkling drink containing 30 grams of protein. Costco is currently selling a 15-pack of the blue raspberry lemonade flavor for $28.99, with orange and fruit punch flavors expected to launch soon.

articles.title: Huge problem with buying cars in Australia
articles.author: James MacSmith
articles.summary: The BYD Shark and Tesla Model Y are discussed in the context of test driving experiences. The article highlights a brief test drive of the BYD Shark, and a positive test drive experience with the Tesla Model Y, influencing a purchase decision. Also, it mentions the new updated Tesla Model Y.

articles.title: Ayam Brand Baked Beans takes on Malaysian flavours
articles.summary: Ayam Brand launched the 'Makan Lain Macam, Semua Pasti Kacang' campaign to promote its baked beans in Malaysian cuisine, offering recipes inspired by local flavors. The campaign showcases the versatility of Ayam Brand Baked Beans, which are available in Original, Light, and Cheese variants, and are sold in major supermarkets nationwide and online.

articles.title: AgiBot to step up foray into overseas markets
articles.author: MA SI
articles.summary: AgiBot is expanding its market reach. The company is also developing new features for its robots, such as hot-swapping batteries and autonomous recharging. AgiBot has secured a contract with China Mobile to develop and deploy humanoid robots for customer service roles.

articles.title: Ann Summers with 80 UK stores makes major change after surge in abuse and theft
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A lingerie and sex toy retailer is testing new technology in several of its UK stores. This trial suggests the introduction of a new service or feature within the retailer's physical locations.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 4 Edge AI Laptop With Snapdragon X CPU Launched In India: Price, Features
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new, more affordable model of the Galaxy Book 4. This version includes the Snapdragon X CPU and incorporates AI features.

articles.summary: A new partnership supports Canadian food and ingredient companies. The partnership will diversify product offerings. The product offerings are for Asia-Pacific consumers.

articles.summary: Moto Buds Loop introduces fresh surprises in audio technology. The product offers something new in the earbuds and headphones market.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct July 2025: All The Biggest Announcements
articles.author: Gamespot
articles.summary: Nintendo launched its new console era with the Switch 2, now available in stores. A Nintendo Direct Partner Showcase for July 2025 provided 25 minutes of information on the Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: What Is Cane Sugar And Why Is It Trending?
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Coca-Cola launched a new Cane Sugar variant. The launch aims to excite consumers and explore the distinct qualities of this ingredient.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad Lite goes on sale: Budget tablet with 9340 mAh battery. Check price, availability, features
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new budget-friendly tablet, the OnePlus Pad Lite, for open sale starting August 1, 2025. The tablet boasts an 11-inch display, quad speakers with Hi-Res Audio, and a 9340 mAh battery.

articles.title: This All-Terrain Electric Scooter Punches Above Its Budget-Friendly Price
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Turboant R9 offers surprisingly good performance and a decent feature set. The product is priced at $550.

articles.title: Netflix fans 'will be crying for a week' after watching new romcom
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A streaming platform released a new romance movie called 'bittersweet' today. The film is now available for streaming.

articles.title: USAG Stuttgart, AAFES holds grand opening of Germany's third Panda Express
articles.author: Balmina Sehra
articles.summary: Panda Restaurant Group, in partnership with Lagardère Travel Retail Group, launched a new Panda Express restaurant at USAG Stuttgart's Panzer Kaserne on July 31. This is the third Panda Express location in Germany, aiming to bring a familiar taste of home to the military community.

articles.title: Bog Apple: NYC discovers stand-alone toilet pods
articles.author: Gregory WALTON
articles.summary: New York City is introducing modular public conveniences designed by a Portland-based company called "JCDecaux" in an effort to address the problem of limited restroom availability. These city-proof units are intended to offer a solution for residents and visitors, with the company deploying multiple units across the city.
